job description:
Engility anticipates hiring a Data Architect / Senior Data Modeler to support

the Joint Program Executive Office for Chemical, Biological Radiological Nuclear Defense (HQ, JPEO-CBRND), in Edgewood, MD. In this role you will perform Data Modeling for their Knowledge Management team.

The Data Modeler will:
  • Create, implement, validate, maintain, and continually shape a set of aligned standard, enterprise-wide integrated CBDP data model architectures and architectural products for the Joint Enterprise Data Initiative (JEDI) and the associated Enterprise Data Management Plan.
  • Develop DODAF data architecture models and reports.
  • Independently, or working with the Government lead or functional Government SMEs, analyze CBDP business system projects, products, and programs; producing architectural data products that visualize system, program, operational, capability, and requirement data interfaces which help to expose data gaps and potential data needs.
  • prepare and publish formal documents to include JEDI data cataloging documents for the JPEO-CBRND Chief Information Office.
  • Independently or working with the Government lead, develop JPEO-CBRND Business Enterprise Data Architecture. (e.g., DODAF views, presentations, etc.), providing early architecture data products to help drive and refine business system data gathering requirements.
  • Participate in organizational events in coordination with the Government Leads, for example All Hands and teaming events.
In addition, the Data Modeler shall perform the following standard reporting requirements:
  • In-person architecture reviews, as needed
  • Weekly touch point calls
  • Update status tracking systems as required
  • Monthly reports, submitted in writing, to discuss the status of deliverables, work plans, and issues
A Minimum of 3-5 years of experience developing and maintaining one or more Department of Defense Acquisition Framework (DODAF) v2.0 data architecture products and/or Data Models within standard data modeling tools (ERStudio, Erwin, etc.).

Secret / Interim Secret Clearance
